decoworld.model.world.combat.defense

Class Shield

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.WorldEntity
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.StatEntity
        • decoworld.model.world.entities.combat.CombatEntity
          • decoworld.model.world.combat.defense.Shield
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasSync, HasCollision, HasCombat, HasHealth, HasStats, StatListener, HasPhysicsBox, HasLevel, HasLocation, HasRotation, WorldItem, java.lang.Iterable<StatType>

    public class Shield
extends CombatEntity
implements HasCollision, HasPhysicsBox
    A shield spawned by a player. This kind of a shield is a wall between projectiles and a player. Behaviours can be defined for the shield for when stat events occur. Created by ShadovvMoon (Samuel Colbran) on 26/09/14.
